net.allwebdesign.common.lib.db
Class DataResults

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      java.util.AbstractList<E>
          java.util.ArrayList<DataRow>
              net.allwebdesign.common.lib.db.DataResults
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<DataRow>, java.util.Collection<DataRow>, java.util.List<DataRow>, java.util.RandomAccess
public class DataResults
extends java.util.ArrayList<DataRow>

A List of DataRows that represents the result set. It adds some additional functionalities including the conversion of result set to a delimited string

Author:
George Moraitakis
See Also:

Constructor Detail

DataResults

public DataResults(java.util.List<DataRow> datarows)
Initialise the data results with a list of rows. It also initialises the data pager with default page size of 200

Parameters:
datarows - the query results
Method Detail

fieldToDelimString

public java.lang.String fieldToDelimString()
Converts a specified field of a List containing data rows to a delimited string of data. This is a convenience method that defaults to first column use and pipe delimited output

Returns:
the delimited string of data or empty string if no data available

fieldToDelimString

public java.lang.String fieldToDelimString(java.lang.String fieldName,
                                           java.lang.String delim)
Converts a specified field of a List containing data rows to a delimited string of data. If no field is specified then it will pick the first field

Parameters:
fieldName - the field to use
delim - the delimiter of the output string. If null it defaults to pipe
Returns:
the delimited string of data or empty string if no data available

convertToHashMap

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> convertToHashMap(java.lang.String keyColumn,
                                                                         java.lang.String valueColumn)
Converts the result set to a hashmap of key/values for 2 selected columns

Parameters:
keyColumn - the column to act as a key
valueColumn - the column to act as value
Returns:
the hashmap with the key/value pairs

viewMapped

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> viewMapped()
Makes a single map out of all rows prepended with a row flag. This is useful when returning to a viewer that requires the id of each row e.g. row0_, row1_ etc. Also includes the row count "_rowsCounterFld" and the "_elementsIds" with the Ids of all the rows This is a convenience overloaded method that passes the default flag "row" and delimiter "_"

Parameters:
rows - the list of rows
flag - the flag for each row e.g. "row"
delim - the delimiter e.g. "_"
Returns:
the list of rows with the field names prepended

viewMapped

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> viewMapped(java.lang.String flag,
                                                                   java.lang.String delim)
Makes a single map out of all rows prepended with a row flag. This is useful when returning to a viewer that requires the id of each row e.g. row0_, row1_ etc. Also includes the row count "_rowsCounterFld" and the "_elementsIds" with the Ids of all the rows

Parameters:
rows - the list of rows
flag - the flag for each row e.g. "row"
delim - the delimiter e.g. "_"
Returns:
the list of rows with the field names prepended and appended

getFirstRowFields

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getFirstRowFields()
Get all the fields of the first row in the result set

Returns:
the fields and their values of the first row or null if there are no results

getRowFields

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getRowFields(int row)
Get all the fields of a specific row in the result set

Parameters:
row - the row to pick
Returns:
the fields and their values of the specific row or null if the result set does not have this row

Parameters:

value - the value of the field
Returns:
